mapper.select: SELECT orderid, orderurl, ordertitle, ordertype, fensi, price, needcnt, hadcnt, userid, orderstate FROM `order` t WHERE orderid = #{orderid}
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` t set t.hadcnt = t.hadcnt + 1 where t.orderid = #{orderid}
UPDATE integral t set t.integral = t.integral + #{integral} where t.userid = #{userid}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.orderid, a.ordertitle, a.orderurl, a.fensi, a.needcnt, a.hadcnt FROM `order` a, ordertake b where a.orderid = b.orderid and a.ordertype = #{ordertype} and b.userid = #{userid}
and b.takestate in ('1','2')
and b.takestate = '3'
order by b.occurdate desc
